posts.name: The Shawshank Redemption
posts.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

posts.name: The Godfather
posts.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

posts.name: The Godfather: Part II
posts.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

posts.name: The Dark Knight
posts.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological test of his ability.

posts.name: 12 Angry Men
posts.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

posts.name: Schindler's List
posts.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.

posts.name: The Lord of the Rings: Part III
posts.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

posts.name: Pulp Fiction
posts.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

posts.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
posts.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

posts.name: The Lord of the Rings: Part I
posts.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

posts.name: Fight Club
posts.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

posts.name: Forrest Gump
posts.description: The events of Vietnam and other historical events unfold through the perspective of man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his sweetheart.

posts.name: Inception
posts.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

posts.name: Star Wars: Episode V
posts.description: Luke begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

posts.name: The Lord of the Rings: Part II
posts.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman.

posts.name: The Matrix
posts.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

posts.name: Goodfellas
posts.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the crime syndicate.

posts.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
posts.description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

posts.name: Shichinin no samurai
posts.description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

posts.name: Se7en
posts.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

posts.name: La vita Ã¨ bella
posts.description: When a Jewish and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

posts.name: Cidade de Deus
posts.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

posts.name: The Silence of the Lambs
posts.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

posts.name: It's a Wonderful Life
posts.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
